title: St. Paul school superintendent reflects on year, looks ahead
description: Listen to Valeria Silva discuss her priorities in the past year and her plans for the upcoming year in the state's second largest school district.
contentencoded:
Dateline:
St. Paul Schools Superintendent Valeria Silva joined MPR News' Tom Weber to talk about her priorities in the past year and her plans for the upcoming year in the state's second largest school district.

• Budget: Impasse puts school districts' plans on hold

• Mainstreaming: New approach to special ed worries some St. Paul teachers

• Behavior: St. Paul middle school gets help to handle disruptive students

• Keeping the job: St. Paul schools chief says she's staying

• Start times: St. Paul school start times stay put, for now
